title: Episode 38 "Hurricane Party" w/ Royal Flush
itunes:title: Episode 38 "Hurricane Party" w/ Royal Flush
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys get ready for the arrival of hurricane Matthew by drinking it up with Queens legend Royal Flush. The guys talk about their collaborative past, TVT records, ODB, and more. The guys are also joined by new artist PHresher out of Brooklyn. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
